requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8210Y or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD™ Graphics 617 or equivalent
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-11400 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX 970 / AMD® Radeon™ RX 570 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8250U or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD™ Graphics 620 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-11400 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX 970 / AMD® Radeon™ RX 570 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
